pages.text: Take item in your hand, and say:$(br)'Mana shape inscribe, ignite!'
Then, say:$(br)'Mana shape adjust, add condition hit.'

pages.title: Description
pages.text: This is very simple Enchantment, which sets those who was hit with item on fire.$(br)You can add 'duration 10' to make target be on fire for 10 seconds.
